properties.description: Pipeline to create the Thesaurus Terms (Dim) Source dataset for use in the CreateTerms dataflow

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(Term.id AS BIGINT)  DimID, 
       CAST(Term.name AS NVARCHAR(200)) DimName, 
       dbo.GetRootParent(Term.id) RootID,
       CAST(CASE ISNULL(Relation.relationship, 0)
          WHEN 0 THEN 1
          ELSE 0
          END AS BIT) DimPreferred,
       CAST(2 AS SMALLINT) DimSourceID,
       CAST(RTRIM(Term.scope + ' ' + Term.additionalnotes) AS NVARCHAR(500)) DimDescription
  from dbo.Term
   LEFT JOIN dbo.Relation ON Relation.relatedtermid = Term.id AND Relation.relationship=2
  ORDER BY DimID

properties.description: Copy Turas Dimension Tables from Warehouse Alpha to MySampleDB using a query.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CAST(TableName AS NVARCHAR(80)) DimTableName, 
   CAST(DimID AS BIGINT) DimID,
   CAST(DimCode AS NVARCHAR(20)) DimCode, CAST(SUBSTRING(DimName, 1, 250) AS NVARCHAR(250)) DimName,
   CAST(SUBSTRING(ISNULL(DimDescription, ''), 1, 500) AS NVARCHAR(500)) DimDescription,  CAST(ISNULL(DimActive, 0) AS BIT) DimActive
FROM
(
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefCCTDateModifiedReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefCCTDateModifiedReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.Programme' TableName, Id DimID, SUBSTRING(ProgrammeCode, 1, 20) DimCode, ProgrammeName DimName, 
   convert(varchar,StartDate, 105) + ' - ' + convert(varchar,EndDate, 105) DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.Programme
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefEducationalOrganiser' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefEducationalOrganiser
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefEducationProviderApprovalType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefEducationProviderApprovalType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefEducationProviderVisitRequiredReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefEducationProviderVisitRequiredReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefEducationProviderVisitType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefEducationProviderVisitType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefExitRecordDestination' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefExitRecordDestination
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefFeedbackArea' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefFeedbackArea
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefFinancialYear' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, CAST(Year AS NVARCHAR) DimName, 
    convert(varchar, [From], 105) + ' - ' + convert(varchar, [To], 105) DimDescription, 
    Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefFinancialYear
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefImmigrationStatus' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefImmigrationStatus
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefJobTitle' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefJobTitle
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefLevel' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefLevel
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefLtftApprovedReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefLtftApprovedReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefParentEducationProvider' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefParentEducationProvider
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefRegion' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefRegion
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefRegistrationStatus' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefRegistrationStatus
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefRoyalCollege' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefRoyalCollege
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefSpecialityTrainingBoard' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefSpecialityTrainingBoard
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefStudyLeaveActivityProvider' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefStudyLeaveActivityProvider
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefStudyLeaveActivityType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefStudyLeaveActivityType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefStudyLeaveWithdrawalReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefStudyLeaveWithdrawalReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefTitle' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefTitle
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefTraineeTimeLinePeriod' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, 
   CAST(Year AS NVARCHAR) + ' ' + convert(NVARCHAR, [From], 105) + ' - ' + convert(NVARCHAR, [To], 105) DimName,
   NULL DimDescription, 
    Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefTraineeTimeLinePeriod
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefTrainingType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefTrainingType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefAnalysisTypes' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefAnalysisTypes
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefApprovedStatus' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefApprovedStatus
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefARCPOutcome' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefARCPOutcome
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefARCPOutcomeReasonType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefARCPOutcomeReasonType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefClaimScope' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefClaimScope
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefClaimType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefClaimType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefDentalApprovalCondition' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefDentalApprovalCondition
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefDentalAssessmentOutcome' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefDentalAssessmentOutcome
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefDentalAssessmentOutcomeReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefDentalAssessmentOutcomeReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefEducationProviderAppealOutcome' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefEducationProviderAppealOutcome
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefEducationProviderEndReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefEducationProviderEndReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefEducationProviderType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefEducationProviderType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefEntityType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefEntityType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefEstablishmentSourceEndReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefEstablishmentSourceEndReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefEstablishmentSourceStartReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefEstablishmentSourceStartReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefEstablishmentSourceType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefEstablishmentSourceType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefExitRecordCategory' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefExitRecordCategory
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefExitRecordReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefExitRecordReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefOOPApprovalStatus' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefOOPApprovalStatus
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefOOPType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefOOPType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefPermission' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefPermission
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefProgrammeClass' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefProgrammeClass
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefProgrammeEndReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefProgrammeEndReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefProgrammeType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefProgrammeType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefRegistrationNumberType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefRegistrationNumberType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefReportTypes' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefReportTypes
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefSpeciality' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefSpeciality
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveApplicationStatus' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveApplicationStatus
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveApprovalOutcome' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveApprovalOutcome
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveClaimStatus' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveClaimStatus
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveNotApprovedReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveNotApprovedReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveTransactionsReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefStudyLeaveTransactionsReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefSubSpeciality' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefSubSpeciality
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefTraineeLtftRequestCategory' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefTraineeLtftRequestCategory
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefTraineePostType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefTraineePostType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefTraineeType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefTraineeType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefTrainerRole' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefTrainerRole
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefTrainerRoleType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefTrainerRoleType
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefTypeofUser' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefTypeofUser
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefARCPOutcomeReasonType' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefARCPOutcomeReasonType

SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefDisabled' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefDisabled
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefEthnicOrigin' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefEthnicOrigin

SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefGender' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefGender
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefMaritalStatus' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefMaritalStatus
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefReligion' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefReligion
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefSexualOrientation' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefSexualOrientation
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.RefTransgender' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.RefTransgender
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefPerformanceSupportEndReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefPerformanceSupportEndReason
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefPerformanceSupportLevel' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefPerformanceSupportLevel
UNION
SELECT N'ODSTuras.SysRefTrainerEndReason' TableName, Id DimID, NULL DimCode, Name DimName, Description DimDescription, Active DimActive FROM ODSTuras.SysRefTrainerEndReason
) AllDims  
ORDER BY DimTableName, DimID;

properties.description: Connect to WarehouseAlpha and get data from Portfolio Dimension Tables using a query.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CAST('ODSPortfolio.SysRefData(' + parent.[Name] + ')' AS NVARCHAR(80)) DimTableName,
       child.Id DimID,
       CAST(NULL AS NVARCHAR(20)) DimCode,
       CAST(child.[Name] AS NVARCHAR(250)) DimName,
       CAST(ISNULL(child.[Description], '') AS NVARCHAR(250)) DimDescription,
       CAST(ISNULL(child.IsActive, 0) AS BIT) DimActive
FROM ODSPortfolio.SysRefData child
    LEFT JOIN ODSPortfolio.SysRefData parent
        ON parent.Id = child.ParentId
WHERE child.ParentId IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY DimTableName,
         DimID;
